item.description: HiðŸ‘‹ Welcome to my online portfolio and blog. I’m Vincent, a result-oriented data scientist and machine learning engineer with a data-driven mindset and attention to details. Ready to work and willing to learn and meet new challenges in a diverse and fast-paced working environment. Competent in executing data mining, data preparation, exploratory data analysis, data story telling, data visualization, feature engineering, data modeling and model deployment. Extensive experience in supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms and concepts.
